patchNotes.title: Talent rework
patchNotes.developerCommentary: Right now Qhira is one melee assassin that have a kit focused only on fighting without any clear wave and even with that she's also not the strongest fighter. My objective here will be to bring Qhira fight potential to the maximum while i give her little options for PvE as i want her to be an PvP focused character and for that i will give her tools to maximize the Spiderman potential

texts.text: Basic attack damage reduced to 80 from 100
Basic attacks against bleeding targets increase the damage by 20% per bleed stack

general.developerCommentary: I want to further compromisse Qhira with the Bleeding synergy

texts.text: Additional functionality: Grappling Hook cooldown reduces faster for each current bleeding stack active on heroes by 2,5%
Increased cooldown from 25 to 35

general.developerCommentary: I want to go on by making Qhira a focused brawler

texts.text: Additional functionality: Also reduces grappling hook cooldown by 5 seconds hitting the same hero 3 times
Additional functionality: After hitting enemies with blood rage 300 times increase maximum bleed stacks by 1

changes.name: Finishing touch

texts.text: Doesn't increase basic attack damage anymore
Additional functionality: Hitting enemies with grappling hook increase Qhira movespeed by 15% for 2 seconds

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes i made with the extra attack damage by hitting bleed targets giving her more basic attack damage would be overkill

texts.text: Damaging atleast 3 heroes  with blood rage reduces grappling hook cooldown by 10 seconds
Additional functionality: Increase Qhira rotating speed on revolving sweep by 200%
Changed functionality: Basic Attacks and Grappling hooks on enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.
Additional functionality: Increase Qhira grappling hook charges by 1
Changed functionality: After using grappling hook empower the next carnage use within 6 seconds, increasing it's range and size by 15% and healing 100% of all damage done.
Additional functionality:Increase Qhira grappling hook charges by 1
If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 150 Health and 50 more health for other heroes under 50% Health.
Additional functionality: Increase Qhira grappling hook bleeding cooldown recharge rate by 2.5%
Changed functionality: Revolving Sweep initial impact heals Qhira by 8% of her maximum life
Chaging prey(Active) : While under Revolving Sweep effect activate to re-cast Revolving Sweep in the target direction, if Qhira hits someone she changes the Revolving Sweep target

changes.name: Unrelenting Strikes

texts.text: Increases unrelenting strikes area by 1 meter

changes.developerCommentary: Unrelenting Strikes is not eazy to hit before getting Silent Killer as you can eazily be stunned or crowd controlled BUT it should be that way as a counter-measure we are expanding it to make it eazier to hit.

changes.name: Final Strike

texts.text: Range is now global
Decrease missile speed from 36 to 32
Only deals damage to heroes now

changes.developerCommentary: This is one of the ultimates that could be hype inducing.. similar to old moments where a Tyrande hits someone with the Owl from a very big distance and just wiped someone from existence, i find that this ultimate should have the opportunity to bring the same joy of a well placed skillshot predict.

texts.text: Additional functionality: Increase Qhira grappling hook charges by 1
Additional functionality: Secondary targets hits on the sweep decrease grappling hook cooldown by 1 second
Additional functionality: Decrease grappling hook cooldown by 1 second when hitting enemy heroes

Changed functionality: For each second Qhira swings around a target she receives 12 spell armor that will expire 5 seconds after re-activates or stop swinging. Hitting enemy heroes with Grappling hook decreases Revolving Sweep cooldown by 3 seconds

changes.name: Silent Killer

texts.text: Decrease unrelenting strikes are by 1 meter

changes.developerCommentary: With the changes on the base Unrenlenting strikes we need to nerf it to the original on Silent Killer, this is one of the level 20 talents that could solo win a fight and the extra area would eazily make it wipe entire teams without effort. It's the Leoric entomb upgrade treatment
